content: Who is the universally acknowledged best author of all time?

As an AI language model, I don't have personal opinions or the ability to determine who is the "best" author of all time. Determining the best author is subjective and can vary greatly depending on individual preferences, cultural backgrounds, and historical context. There have been countless exceptional authors throughout history, each contributing unique perspectives and masterpieces to literature. Some authors are highly regarded for their innovative styles, others for their profound insights into the human condition, and still others for their influential roles in shaping literary movements. It's essential to explore a diverse range of authors and genres to appreciate the richness and breadth of literature.
